    void moveBlackCrossForward()
    this method moves forward the black cross of the single player mode and checks if black cross reached the next pope space cell
    void moveForward​(int playerNum)
    this method moves forward by 1 position the specified player and checks if the next pope space is reached if more than one player has to move forward at once this is not the method to be used
    void moveForwardMultiplePLayers​(boolean player1, boolean player2, boolean player3, boolean player4)
    this method moves forward more all players specified and after that controls if any of them reached the next pope space this is the method to use if more than one player has to move forward at once

  • Method Details

    • moveForward

      public void moveForward​(int playerNum) throws EndGameException
      this method moves forward by 1 position the specified player and checks if the next pope space is reached if more than one player has to move forward at once this is not the method to be used
      Parameters:
      playerNum - is the player number of the player that has to advance
      Throws:
      EndGameException

    • moveForwardMultiplePLayers

      public void moveForwardMultiplePLayers​(boolean player1, boolean player2, boolean player3, boolean player4) throws EndGameException
      this method moves forward more all players specified and after that controls if any of them reached the next pope space this is the method to use if more than one player has to move forward at once
      Parameters:
      player1 - true if player 1 has to move
      player2 - true if player 2 has to move
      player3 - true if player 3 has to move
      player4 - true if player 4 has to move
      Throws:
      EndGameException

    • moveBlackCrossForward

      public void moveBlackCrossForward() throws SoloGameLostException
      this method moves forward the black cross of the single player mode and checks if black cross reached the next pope space cell
      Throws:
      SoloGameLostException

    • getCurrentVictoryPointsOfPlayer

      public int getCurrentVictoryPointsOfPlayer​(int playerNum)
      this method is used to get the current victory points total of a player based on his faith track stats
      Parameters:
      playerNum - is the player to check
      Returns:
      is the total victory point of the faith track of the specified player in the current moment
